project.title: Lisa's Button
project.description: A WPF program of a button that represents another student in my class where they recognize themselves when using it

project.title: Quick Communications Cap
project.description: An interactive wearable accessory that protects wearers by capturing images of predators and sending loved ones their location

project.title: The IKEA Builder
project.description: A Google Cardboard interface that lets those simulate building select IKEA furniture before buying it to prevent nervousness in the future

project.title: Planting Hygge
project.description: A Kinect interface that is a thought-provoking experience which helps the user to think about their friends and family while planting

project.title: Temperature Anomalies
project.description: A D3.js bubble scatter chart that visualizes different temperature anomalies for different regions of the world from 1987-2016

project.title: My Spotify Data
project.description: A D3.js tree chart that visualizes my listening history and sorts it into songs, artists and genres

project.title: Smartphone Market Shares
project.description: A D3.js pie chart that visualizes the global market share of shipments by smartphone vendors
